realization.translation[0].definitions[0: when you understand something that you had not understood before
I was shocked by the realization of what I had done.
the realization that she might never recover from her illness
There is a growing realization that we must manage the Earth’s resources more carefully.
realization.translation[0].definitions[1: when you achieve something that you had planned or hoped for
realization.translation[0].definitions[2: when you change something into money by selling it
realization.translation[1].definitions[0: the act of changing something into money by selling it
The sale will result in the realization of over £325 million.
